name: Pyuu to Fuku! Jaguar Byuu to Deru! Megane-Kun
name_original: Pyuu to Fuku! Jaguar Byuu to Deru! Megane-Kun
description:
Pyuu to Fuku! Jaguar Byuu to Deru! Megane-Kun is an action-arcade game developed by INTENSE. It was originally released in 2004. Konami published the game.
Pyuu to Fuku! Jaguar Byuu to Deru! Megane-Kun is available on Game Boy Advance.
